trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som tillater brukeren å velge elementer fra de underordnede elementene.

trans-unit.source: Selector is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Velgeren er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, som betyr at den kan inneholde en samling objekter av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>koblet denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>

trans-unit.source: Element that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som lytter til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Event handler to add.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected>koblet denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected>

trans-unit.source: Element that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som lytter til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Event handler to add.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Returns an item container to the state it was in before <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en elementbeholderen til den var i før <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*>

trans-unit.source: ClearContainerForItemOverride clears the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property when the item container is removed from the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: ClearContainerForItemOverride fjerner den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>knyttet egenskapen når elementbeholderen fjernes fra treet visuell.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is done so item containers behave correctly when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres slik elementet beholdere fungere som det skal når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>bruker beholder resirkulering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationMode> and "Container Recycling" in [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationMode>og "Beholderen resirkulering" i [optimalisere ytelsen: Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationMode>

trans-unit.source: The item container element.
trans-unit.target: Item beholder-elementet.

trans-unit.source: The data item.
trans-unit.target: Dataelement.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*> attached property that indicates whether an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>knyttet egenskap som indikerer om et element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Object to query concerning the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*> property.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som spørringen angående den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Boolean value, **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*> property is **true**.
trans-unit.target: Boolsk verdi **true** hvis den <> </> *> egenskapen * *true**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the keyboard focus is within the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om fokus på tastaturet er innenfor det<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the attached property.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som kan lese den tilknyttede egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Value of the property, **true** if the keyboard focus is within the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen **true** Hvis fokus på tastaturet er innenfor den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelectionActive*>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSelectionActive*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> should keep the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*> synchronized with the current item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> skal beholdes i <> </> *> synkronisert med gjeldende element i den <> </> *> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*> is always synchronized with the current item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*> is never synchronized with the current item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*> is synchronized with the current item only if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> uses a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> alltid synkroniseres med det gjeldende elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <> </> *> er ikke synkronisert med gjeldende element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>synkroniseres med den gjeldende elementet hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> bruker en <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> internally.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiveres når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> internt.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Updates the current selection when an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> has changed
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer gjeldende utvalg når et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> er endret

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Called when the source of an item in a selector changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når kilden for et element i en velger endres.

trans-unit.source: Old value of the source.
trans-unit.target: Gammel verdi for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: New value of the source.
trans-unit.target: Ny verdi for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Called when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når utvalget endres.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder det angitte elementet til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som brukes til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The specified item to display.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte elementet skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>koblet denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>

trans-unit.source: Element that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som lytter til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected>koblet denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected>

trans-unit.source: Element that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som lytter til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandling fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>rutet hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir negativ indeksen for det første elementet i den gjeldende utvalg eller returnerer én (-1) Hvis utvalget er tom.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> supports selecting a single item, the SelectedIndex property returns the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>støtter Hvis du velger ett enkelt element, egenskapen SelectedIndex Returnerer indeksen for det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> supports multiple selections, SelectedIndex returns the index of the item that the user selected first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>støtter flere merkede, SelectedIndex Returnerer indeksen for elementet som brukeren valgt først.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: Setting SelectedIndex in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified by the index.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen SelectedIndex i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>som støtter flere valg fjerner eksisterende valgte elementer og angir utvalget til elementet som angis i indeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: SelectedIndex returns -1 if selection is empty.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex returnerer -1 Hvis utvalg er tomt.

trans-unit.source: If you set SelectedIndex to a value less that -1, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter SelectedIndex til en verdi mindre denne -1, en <xref:System.ArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: If you set SelectedIndex to a value equal or greater than the number of child elements, the value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt SelectedIndex til en verdi som er lik eller større enn antallet underordnede elementer, ignoreres verdien.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The index of first item in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for første elementet i gjeldende utvalg.

trans-unit.source: The default value is negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er negativ én (-1).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedIndex*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first item in the current selection or returns null if the selection is empty
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det første elementet i merket eller returnerer null hvis utvalget er tom

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> supports selecting a single item, the SelectedItem property returns the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>støtter Hvis du velger ett enkelt element, egenskapen SelectedItem returnerer det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> supports multiple selections, SelectedItem returns the item that the user selected first.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>støtter flere merkede, SelectedItem returnerer elementet som brukeren valgt først.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: Setting SelectedItem in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector> that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen SelectedItem i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>som støtter flere valg fjerner eksisterende valgte elementer og angir utvalget til det angitte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The first item in the current selection or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the selection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Det første elementet i merket eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis utvalget er tom.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>, obtained by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for den <> </> *>, hentede ved hjelp av <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath%2A> property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath%2A>egenskapen angir banen til egenskapen som brukes til å bestemme verdien for egenskapen SelectedValue.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting SelectedValue to a value X attempts to select an item whose value evaluates to X; if no such item can be found, the selection is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SelectedValue til en verdi X prøver å velge et element med verdien evalueres til X; Hvis det finnes ingen slik element, fjernes utvalget.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*> from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen som brukes til å hente den <> </> *> fra den <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValuePath property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedValuePath angir banen til egenskapen som brukes til å bestemme verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The path used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Banen som ble brukt til å få <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValuePath*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når utvalget av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever there is a change to a selection.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når det er en endring i et utvalg.

trans-unit.source: A selection can be changed not only by user interaction but also by binding as well as other set values.
trans-unit.target: Et utvalg kan endres ikke bare av brukeren, men også av binding i tillegg til andre sett verdier.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property value that indicates whether an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Angir en egenskapsverdi som angir om et element i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector"> </xref> er valgt.

trans-unit.target: Objekt som du vil angi egenskapen.
